Articles.Content:
Hi all!

Im sorry to admit that i just cannot help myself with the Alt F12 magic console to get me out of trouble im a terrible human being i know lol. I was wandering if there is any way of removing the debug console or at the least changing the key binding (i could get my girlfriend to set a key and swear to never tell me). As much as i think the debug menu is good for testing stuff I feel that doing a proper iron man career mode is impossible for the weaker willed people like myself lol

Thanks for any information in advance
As far as I can tell, there's no way to remove it. Best thing to do is to learn to control your urges, as difficult as it may be.

As far as I can tell, there's no way to remove it. Best thing to do is to learn to control your urges, as difficult as it may be.

That's what I was afraid of lol
cheeky bump to see if anything has come to light regarding a mod or workaround to remove the debug console?

obtain screwdriver

remove F12 button from keyboard

urges dwindle

If thine eye offends...
